snippet.title: Röki - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the box-fresh announcement trailer for our debut indie title Röki. Röki is an adventure game about a young girl venturing deep into the forbidden wilderness, a land of dark mystery, ancient magic and monsters.

You can follow our progress on Twitter @PolyTreehouse or on our website at www.Polygon-Treehouse.com

Hope you like it, we had a lot of fun making it. 
Thanks for watching,
Tom & Alex
